beer.beer_description:
WHAT THE HELLS? THANKS FOR ASKING.
Hells is the lovechild of our two favourite German beer styles - Helles and Pilsner. Clean, crisp and dry, it’s the beer we always wanted to drink and the reason we started our brewery. We hope you agree.

Clean and refreshing with a dry hop finish. taste the great depth of flavour that comes from the long, slow maturation in tank. This is how a great lager should taste.

This is the beer Camden Town was born to brew. Combining two of our favourite beer styles into one, we take the crisp, dry body of a German-style Pilsner and give it the gentle hopping of a Helles to create the beer we really want to drink – this beer is the reason we decided to start a brewery.

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 465 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 15 distinct venues!
You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 15 states or countries. Visit 5 more for Level 4!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 25 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 6! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment: In 2 min kotz ich sowas von aufn Tresen oder beim Bär ins gnack

items.badge_description: Hell yea helles! This traditional German pale lager is typically full-bodied, mildly sweet, and light-colored, making it a perfect go to for any occasion. That's 10 different beers with the style of Lager - Helles or Bock - Maibock / Heller (Helles) / Lentebock. Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 410 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 83!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 80 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 17!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 75 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 16!
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 25 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 6.

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 60 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 13!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 120 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 25!

Hell yea helles! This traditional German pale lager is typically full-bodied, mildly sweet, and light-colored, making it a perfect go to for any occasion. That's 5 different beers with the style of Lager - Helles or Bock - Maibock / Heller (Helles) / Lentebock. Try 5 more for Level 2!
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 5 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 2.

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 5 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description: From the playground to your check-in, tag is a universally good time. Now tag some more friends while sharing your beer adventures.
Are you crazy? Five different types of beer in one day? Hope you were just sampling.

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 15 check-ins with a photo.
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 5 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description: Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 25 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 6!
